name: Thorny Weather
description:
You're a gardener who can make plants magically sprout from the soil!

The problem is, you're not the most precise gardener in the world - and there's plenty of thorns to get rid of. Luckily, you know about the explosive powers of plants...

Enjoy an entirely too ambitious puzzler condensed in 16 levels, some of them frustrating.

Can be played with the keyboard or a gamepad.
